title: Bug 6304: Unable to synchronize a .java file and another resource
description: When attempting to synchronize a .java file with another resource, the system fails to perform the synchronization properly.
OB: When trying to synchronize a .java file and another resource, the system encounters an error and does not complete the synchronization process.
EB: The synchronization process for a .java file and another resource should complete successfully without any errors or issues.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Open a .java file in the system.
2. Attempt to synchronize the .java file with another resource.
3. Observe the error and incomplete synchronization process.
